nodes.text: Resolute command was a command unit stationed aboard the bridge of the Venator-class Star Destroyer Resolute. Jedi Commander Ahsoka Tano was part of the command organization and, during the Battle of Bothawui, contacted Gold Leader Anakin Skywalker, who led Gold Squadron against General Grievous's fleet in the battle. A clone trooper also served as part of the command during the battle.
